properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Tuingie â€”
tuingie kwa Yahweh Bwana
Yahweh Bwana
furaha nyingi siku ya leo. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nilifurahi waliponiambia,
Tutaingia nyumba ya sala.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Bwana asema
nyumba yangu i leo,
Itaitwa nyumba ya sala.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tumwabudu Bwana
Yesu Kristu,
Atupa uzima wa milele.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tufurahie siku hii ya leo,
Kwani ni siku yake Bwana.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Sasa miguu yetu isimame,
Katika hekalu lake Bwana.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Tumshukuru Bwana
Yesu Kristu,
Atupa uzima wa milele.
